chara.textHome: Art is wonderful, isn't it?

My dream is to learn how to restore artwork,
so I work part-time at the art museum
in Mizuna so I can always be around it.

Sometimes I make mistakes,
but everyone is so kind and
helps me through them.
Why don't you come for a visit?

I'm told my father was involved
with art when he was alive,
so I want to have a job that's art-related too.
I'm more powerful now! Aren't I?
Power is welling up within me...
I can get even stronger than this!

I never held a weapon or even got in
a fight before becoming a Magical Girl,
so battles are a little scary for me.

I can't seem to get used to
fighting Witches and Familiars.

My body always tenses up...
and I get scared.
But I love Kamihama...and Mizuna.
So, I have to protect them.
I was lonely...
So I'm glad we could get together, hee hee.
Was I waiting for you?
Yes, actually, I was!
I wanted to see you as soon as I could.
Good morning.
*Giggle*
I'm happy to see you so early in the morning.
The early bird really does catch the worm.

Oh, I promised to make lunch next time,
but what should I make?
Hm?
Oh, no, not for school.
This is for someone at work.
Time to go to work...
I work part-time at the art museum.
Why don't you stop by sometime?

There's lots of old art there.
You can feel the history.
*Yawn* Mmm...

As night falls, so does the temperature.
I'm a little cold...
I wish I had someone beside me right now.

If I have time between showing groups
around the exhibits, sometimes they let me
watch while they restore a piece.
I always lose track of time there.
Shall we go hunt some Witches?

I'm still not used to battle,
but I'll try my hardest to support you!

I know they're enemies, but fighting things
that look like Magical Girls is tough...
But it needs to be done, so I'll do my best!

I'm quiet around new people...
I worry what to talk about with them.
But you're very easy to talk to.
Eek! O-oh no, I knocked it over again.
Dear me! Now all the files are mixed up...
What was the order again?
Like this?

Umm...if you have the time, I'd love
to spend more time with you.

Of course, you don't have to if you
have plans already...

You'd like to see how
I introduce the exhibits?
*Ahem*
This piece is quite rare in Japagh...
Ack! I bit my tongue.
Working at the art museum is really fun.

I took the job because I like
historic art and buildings, but
it's also to follow my dreams.
What did this originally look like?
Why did people love it so much?

I love thinking about those kinds of things.
That's why I want to work in art restoration.

I want to learn more about swords
from Sayuki, but she seems
pretty busy with work...

We go to the same school,
so maybe I can invite her to eat
lunch together sometime.
Ria is always telling me to ""stand tall""...
How exactly do you do that?
Maybe if I go like this! No?
You're always here when I get lonely...
I love it.
I'm afraid...but I will do what I can!
Hm? What? Did we win?
Pheeew... We won.
I tried my best!
Hee hee... I'm glad.
I'm Mayu Kozue.

Um... I'm a bit shy,
but it's not that I like being alone.
I treasure people who spend time with me.
Um, do you think...I just got stronger?
Even I can feel how strong I've become.
Now I can do more than ever.

Allow me to guide you around
the next exhibit.

My father passed away in an accident
when I was very young, so now
my mother and I live by ourselves.

Sometimes I wonder how things would
be different if my father were alive.

How I'd love to talk about art and
all sorts of things with him.
